segments.text: I notice the girl reaching up to the boy, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so happy, like she doesn’t even see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how focused she is while the kids are being so reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in all this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
